revised_title: Decomposition of Magnesium Hydroxide: A Study Using Electron Microscopy
tldr: The author used an electron microscope to study the decomposition of magnesium hydroxide crystals. They observed the crystallographic and morphological changes that occur during the endothermic decomposition process, which involves the dehydration of magnesium hydroxide to magnesium oxide. The study provides insights into the structural changes and the formation of highly ordered aggregates of micro-crystallites of magnesium oxide.
